rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {ECC4750%, ECO4750, ECO5820}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC4650, ECX5465} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Theories of hedging and speculation; determination of spot and futures prices, and intertemporal allocation; market efficiency; expectations, including adaptive expectations and rational expectations.
